name: Broken Down
description:
Broken Down is a platformer made for the Global Game Jam in which two aliens must guide one another across landscapes dotted with portals, tunnels, switches, and traps. In order to progress, the player must switch between father and son to access inaccessible areas.

Created for Global Game Jam 2014 in January 2014. Linux build coming as soon as we figure out the automated build process.
